pr_title: Fix file name extraction on Windows

timeline.message:
Fix file name extraction on Windows

Fixes #2300

timeline.bodyText: minor but I think better to put this into IOUtil?
timeline.author: cangencer

File name is the part of {@code + * url.getPath()} after the last '/' character. Returns empty string if the + * path ends with a '/'. + *
